name: ReversE (Snowman With A Scarf)
description:
Play through a rough-like style game with a ball you throw at enemies. Don't let the ball touch the ground, and don't get hit.

(This game was made in ~3 hours for the Trijam #133: The 3 hour game jam)

Controls:

< / > / ^ = Left / Right / Up

Z = Jump

X = Attack

C = Full stop
